question: How can I participate?
answer: One single Creature grants access to all Creature World exclusive experiences.

question: Where can I get a Creature?
answer: All 10,000 creatures have already been distributed by us and are now only available on the secondary market. Visit {OpenSea} or [NiftyGateway} to get one. Coming to Coinbase NFT soon.

question: How can I check my Creatureâ€™s rarity?
answer: Creature World does not not live on any rarity sites. If you love your Creature, you have the rarest Creature in the universe.

question: Do I have IP rights over my creature?
answer: While we encourage people to make content and derivative artwork of their Creature, no one is granted commercial license or IP ownership.
